title: Starry dreams tomato pasta
ingredients: ['2 teaspoons olive oil', '450g stelle (star shaped) pasta', '1/2 onion, diced', '725ml hot water', '3 teaspoons chicken stock cube granules', '1 (400g) tin tomatoes with green chillies, drained', '4 tablespoons fresh chopped coriander', '1/2 teaspoon ground cumin', '1/4 teaspoon garlic salt', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper']
